class.name: posvelacceff_controllers/PosVelAccEffController
class.description: This controller subscribes position, velocity, acceleration, and effort command. The controller expects a posvelacceff_command_interface::PosVelAccEffJointInterface as a hardware interface.

class.name: posvelacceff_controllers/PositionController
class.description: This controller subscribes position command. The controller expects a posvelacceff_command_interface::PosVelAccEffJointInterface as a hardware interface.
